attributes.additional_details: Pass a law to have dog licenses, and sentences for owners of animals that attack people
attributes.background: To stab someone with a knife holds a custodial sentence I. Regards to dogs attacking. It is lack of training and knowledge along with neglectful owners,Instead of banding breeds and penalising owners with said breeds that control their animals, have sentences for those who have animals that attack

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/643650
Bring back a Dog Licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643631
Introduce screening process for dog owners
